title: WaveSpeed AI - Enhance Images with Precision

hero.heading: Enhance Images with AI Inpainting
hero.description: Transform your photos by intelligently filling in missing areas, enhancing visual appeal effortlessly.

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Fill in the gap in the sky, restore the missing building, enhance the landscape...

examples.heading: Before & After Enhancements
examples.description: Witness the power of AI inpainting as it revives and restores your images with remarkable accuracy.

features.heading: Why Choose AI Inpainting?
features.description: Transform your images with cutting-edge inpainting technology, delivering results you'll love.

items.title: Intuitive Enhancement
items.description: Effortlessly restore images with a simple click, making your workflow seamless.

items.title: Creative Freedom
items.description: Our AI gives you the flexibility to fill in backgrounds and enhance scenes without limits.

items.title: Safety First
items.description: Your images are processed locally, ensuring your data remains private and secure.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: A straightforward process to amplify your photos

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop or browse to upload your photo. Our system supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Enhancement
items.description: The advanced AI identifies missing areas and fills them in while maintaining high quality.

items.title: Download Your Enhanced Image
items.description: Review your enhanced photo, and download it in stunning quality ready for sharing.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users enhancing their photos with our AI-powered technology

items.name: Emily Curtis
items.comment: AI Inpainting transformed my family photos by seamlessly filling in background gaps. I'm impressed!

items.name: James Thompson
items.comment: As a photographer, I've never seen anything like this. It saves me tons of editing time!

items.name: Ava Roberts
items.comment: The results are stunning, and I love that my images are processed right on my device.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover what you need to know about AI Inpainting

items.title: What can AI Inpainting fill in?
items.description: AI Inpainting is capable of filling in a variety of elements like missing backgrounds, gaps in images, and even complex textures to enhance photo quality.

items.title: Is this feature free to use?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user gets 30 free credits daily for image enhancements, and there are options to earn more through activities.

items.title: Can I use enhanced images commercially?
items.description: Users with a paid subscription can utilize their enhanced images for commercial projects, while free users should refer to the Terms of Service for limitations.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Images are processed directly in your browser, ensuring your photos never leave your device and that your privacy is maintained securely.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Images?
footer.description: Try AI Inpainting today and see the remarkable transformations for yourself. No sign-up needed.
